definition[0]: very plain in appearance, with little or no colour or decoration
example[0]: In the cold dawn light, the castle looked stark and forbidding.
example[1]: the stark beauty of New Mexico
definition[1]: unpleasantly clear and impossible to avoid
example[2]: The movie shows the stark realities of life in the ghetto.
example[3]: The extreme poverty of the local people is in stark contrast to the wealth of the tourists.
example[4]: We are faced with a stark choice.
example[5]: a stark reminder of life under Communist rule
